title: The Auto attack particle BUG
body:
Hey Summoners and Riot members,

I had a few geames in the last two weeks  in wich one Autoattack particle remaind on the Map after it hits a Opponent. The first one was an Ezreal "Thunderbolt" wich remaind on at the same area and glow the whole time. The second one was a Heimerdinger auto attack i am sry i dont know an better description. This "aa" was two or three sizes larger than a normal "aa" from Heimerdinger the creepy thing was that the particle rotate strange fast. unfortunately i cant show you some Screenshots. But i hope this bug report is still helpful.

Have a nice day and fun in your Ranked Games Twialun.

replies.body:
Zum englischen Forum gehts hier lange http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/

Mir sind bisher keine deiner beschriebenen Bugs aufgefallen hab aber auch nicht so darauf geachtet :)
